originalText.text:
I don‚Äôt even leave reviews BUT SOMEBODY NEEDS TO EXPLAIN WHY THIS WAS IN MY CHOPPED CHEESE. And also, WHAT IS IT? I had to spit this out while I was eating because I was chewing down on something that wasn‚Äôt edible. Not sure if its a small rock or what, but I need answers. Will be calling if I don‚Äôt get a response. Please be better and take your food preparation more seriously.

- signed, a ONE TIME customer

originalText.text: i‚Äôve tried chicken over rice from a lot of places. delis, halal restaurants, and street carts. this place by far has the best chicken over rice and it‚Äôs the only place i‚Äôll order it from. they are AMAZING at following any specific instructions you leave (if ordering on uber eats) on the food and it is consistent. plus it‚Äôs about 11$ for a large which can easily last you two meals. absolutely love them for keeping quality chicken over rice with great portions at a reasonable price. I NEVER LEAVE REVIEWS BUT 10000/10

originalText.text: I don‚Äôt like leaving negative reviews, but this is just ridiculous. I ordered a hero earlier, and the guy forgets the onions on my sandwich so now I have to wait additional time so the guy can add the onions I initially asked for. Had I not asked, I would have been charged extra for the onions like the last time I ordered. I decided to give them the benefit of the doubt since people have bad days and make mistakes.  I get home and realized that the sandwich felt a bit light, and to my surprise, the guy gives me 3 of the most miserly slices of ham. I could have just ordered a sandwich on a roll instead of overpaying for a hero. Even subway with their subpar sandwiches gives you more meat. There are plenty of other delis in the neighborhood, I‚Äôll just go somewhere else since they don‚Äôt really care about quality or return customers.

originalText.text:
Nice people and clean laid out place. The only thing is I asked for a turkey burger and peach cobbler. They gave me a cherry pie and turkey deli sandwich. I cleared up the pie mistake but discovered I didn‚Äôt get my burger when i got home. The sandwich was good but I wanted a Turkey burger üçî.
Make sure your order is right.

originalText.text:
This deli is a food swamp. They have little to no organic and healthy options. All the snacks contain hydrogenated seed oils and synthetic ingredients. They must also adress the Cats in the basement who are not neutered; filling the entire deli with Cat pheromones.

I would give them a better rating but too many faults to ignore.
